title: Marrying for health insurance? The ACA cost crisis forces some drastic choices
description: While Congress debates bringing back Affordable Care Act subsidies, many Americans have already made life-altering decisions to afford health care.
content: While Congress debates bringing back Affordable Care Act subsidies, many Americans have already made life-altering decisions to afford health care.
